articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Force intact, fear fades: India remain T20 World Cup favourites, but Super 8s strip some aura
articles.description: Despite an unbeaten run, India's T20 team has revealed vulnerabilities, including an opening batsman's struggles and diffidence against finger-spin. As they enter the Super Eights, challenges from South Africa's long boundaries and the West Indies' experienced bowling attack, alongside Zimbabwe's surprise package Muzarabani, will test their mettle.

articles.title: Cheteshwar Pujara, Mohammad Kaif, Yuzvendra Chahal make bold prediction; pick these 4 teams as semi-finalists of T20 World Cup 2026
articles.description: Defending champions India, 2024 runner-ups South Africa, two-time champions West Indies and Zimbabwe are in Group A. While the 2009 champions, Pakistan, the 2014 champions, Sri Lanka, two-time winners England, and New Zealand are in Group B of the T20 World Cup 2026.
